com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class Reason

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.Reason

  • public class Reason extends java.lang.Object
    Diagnostic information about a CAP message. Possibly, a reason behind a CapException or CapFeedException.

    This class is immutable and thread-safe.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Reason.Level
      Level of a Reason, to describe its severity.
      static interface  Reason.Type
      Type of a Reason.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reason

        public Reason(java.lang.String xPath, Reason.Type type, java.lang.Object... messageParams)
        Builds a Reason object.
        Parameters:
        xPath - the fully-predicated XPath expression to what the reason refers to (e.g., /alert[1]/info[1])
        type - the type of the reason
        messageParams - message parameters for the reason

    • Method Detail

      • prefixWithXpath

        public Reason prefixWithXpath(java.lang.String xPathPrefix)
        Builds a copy of this Reason, with the XPath prefixed with xPathPrefix.

        For instance, if the this reason has XPath /alert[1], and xPathPrefix is /feed[1]/entry[1], the output reason will have XPath /feed[1]/entry[1]/alert[1]. The xPathPrefix is expected to be fully-predicated.

        This method should be used when an XML file is validated recursively, and the diagnostic information collected about an XML fragment needs to be changed so that it references the fragment within the XML file.

      • getXPath

        public java.lang.String getXPath()
        Returns:
        the XPath expression to what the reason refers to

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
